notes.title: House of Cards
notes.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

notes.title: Bloodline
notes.description: A family of adult siblings find that their secrets and scars are revealed when their black sheep of a brother returns home.

notes.title: Love
notes.description: A program that follows a couple who must navigate the exhilarations and humiliations of intimacy, commitment and other things they were hoping to avoid.

notes.title: Master of None
notes.description: The personal and professional life of Dev, a 30-year-old actor in New York.

notes.title: w/ Bob & David
notes.description: Bob and David emerge from the time machine they entered sixteen years ago and are reunited with the cast of Mr. Show.
